body_html:
German Learning App

The German Learning App is an interactive language-learning platform designed to help users practice German through structured exercises and intuitive feedback.

What it does

  • Provides sentence-based translation and transcription exercises
  • Supports progressive difficulty levels
  • Designed for extensibility with AI-driven features
  • Clean, user-friendly interface for daily practice

Example Code

```javascript function checkAnswer(userInput, correctAnswer) { return userInput.trim() === correctAnswer; }

body_html:
Luck in Football

Luck in Football is a data analytics project focused on exploring randomness, variance, and performance outcomes in football using automated data pipelines and statistical analysis.

What it does

  • Ingests large football datasets via APIs
  • Automates data cleaning and processing
  • Performs exploratory data analysis and visualization
  • Highlights patterns related to luck vs. performance

Example Code

```python import pandas as pd

df = pd.read_csv("matches.csv") print(df.describe())
